alert.note: Alert for Wexford (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 03 at 10:53AM EDT until August 03 at 11:45AM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WEXFORD AND MISSAUKEE COUNTIES... At 1052 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lake City, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 1043 AM, Wexford County Airport gusted to 55 mph. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Wexford and Missaukee Counties, including the following locations... Merritt. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
